data.eml:eml: A new species, new synonymy, and notes on Neomacrocoris (Heteroptera: Nepomorpha: Naucoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sites, Robert W. (2015): A new species, new synonymy, and notes on Neomacrocoris (Heteroptera: Nepomorpha: Naucoridae). Zootaxa 3964 (5): 553-560, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3964.5.5
